title: Savory Breakfast Egg Muffins

ingredients.notes: Sargento, smoked to perfection for a deep, savory flavor
Mitsukan, adds a pop of color and freshness
Look for thick-cut, applewood-smoked, Niman Ranch

instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C). Line the muffin tin with paper liners or grease with butter.
In a medium bowl, whisk together flour, salt, and pepper until well combined.
Add melted butter to the dry ingredients and stir until just combined. Do not overmix.
In a large bowl, whisk together eggs, Smoked Gouda cheese, chives, and cooked bacon until smooth.
Divide egg mixture evenly among muffin cups, filling each about 3/4 of the way full.
Sprinkle remaining Smoked Gouda cheese on top of each muffin.
Bake for 18 minutes or until whites are set and yolks still slightly jiggly (about 1-2 seconds).
Remove from oven and let cool in tin for 5 minutes before transferring to a wire rack to cool completely.
